entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump One of the best ever? Tell that to those left behind after 108,000 deaths from covid19. Tell that to people unemployed because you played golf instead of addressing the pandemic. #TrumpLiesEverytimeHeSpeaks #TrumpIsAnIdiot #TrumpCrimeFamily #TrumpDepression #25thAmendmentNow
